name: Destin Flight Works
about: Destin Flight Works is an FAA Part 141 and VA-approved flight school located at Destin Executive Airport in Destin, Florida. We offer comprehensive flight training programs from Private Pilot to advanced certifications such as Instrument, Commercial, Multi-Engine, and Turbine Transition. Our highly qualified and certified instructors provide quality training, and our diverse aircraft fleet caters to both beginner and advanced pilots. Additionally, we operate as an FAA-approved Part 145 Repair Station, providing major and minor airframe and engine maintenance, inspections, and modifications. We are proud to serve veterans with VA-approved courses and offer introductory and discovery flights for those new to aviation. With ideal year-round weather, Destin Flight Works is your premier choice for aviation training and services on the Emerald Coast.
